Class Helper

java.lang.Object
kp.client.gui.utils.Helper
public class Helper extends Object
Helper class for GUI-related utilities.

  • Method Details

    • loadIcon

      public static Optional<javafx.scene.image.Image> loadIcon()
      Loads the application icon.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the icon image if available, otherwise an empty Optional

    • loadStylesheet

      public static Optional<String> loadStylesheet()
      Loads the stylesheet resource.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the stylesheet URL as a string if available, otherwise an empty Optional

    • createCircle

      public static javafx.scene.shape.Shape createCircle(javafx.scene.paint.Paint color)
      Creates a circle with a specified color.
      Parameters:
      color - the fill color of the circle
      Returns:
      the created circle shape

    • addRadioButtons

      public static void addRadioButtons(javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup toggleGroup, List<String> labelList, List<String> userDataList, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
      Adds radio buttons to the specified pane, using the provided labels and user data.
      Parameters:
      toggleGroup - the toggle group to which the radio buttons will belong
      labelList - the list of labels for the radio buttons
      userDataList - the list of user data objects for the radio buttons
      pane - the pane to which radio buttons will be added
